attributes.review: Tell me why the app looks like it was made with Internet Explorer. This is the app equivalent of “graphic design is my passion.” 🐸 It’s so ugly my goldfish died while I was taking him out for a walk one morning because I accidentally dropped my phone on the sidewalk and caused him a horrible death. Never lay eyes on this app unless you want to endure a pain like no other. #RIPFishy
attributes.title: It killed my fish

attributes.review: this app is horrible, first off when the app downloaded I could only click onto this app, every other app was broken , and my phone was frozen, and then I got a call and they said If I didn’t vote for trump swat would be sent to my house they said “you won’t wanna know what happens then”. This app took away my freedom and safety. Plz I beg you donT GET THE APP
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app is so amazing.....AT BEING HORRIBLE!! It took forever just to download and once I opened it   I seen this horrible Cheeto man. I even showed my cat and he died afterwards!! I later called the police because I wasn’t having it, but the app crashed my phone!! I COULDNT CALL THE COPS!! I’m definitely filing a report after this! Don’t download it. It’s trash. I had to buy a whole new phone. I WANT MY MONEY BACK CHEETO MAN
attributes.title: WHAT THE FRIG

attributes.review: This app took forever to download! Once I finally got it to download it kept crashing? Finally after about two days it stopped crashing and I was finally able to use it! Once I put in my phone number it spammed me with sexist and racist things!!!! Moral of the story, don’t download this trash app! 😄😐
attributes.title: Slows down phone

attributes.review: don’t just don’t ❤️ took a year to download after that it came to my house and took my food the disrespect on its way out drop kicked my pet lion like tffff and it showed me some cheeto nudes my eyes burned so bad i had go into surgery i was in tears 👁💧👄💧👁 when i got home it hacked my phone and tried to take my billions of dollars but jonathan gallindo beat him to it so then it summoned demons they call themselves troompa loompas and they were all so orange and ugly it made me go unconscious for some days don’t download it if you value your mental health it also drop kickes you if you call it bunker boi fan 😔😔 never again 👉🏼🚪💅🏽😾🕺🏽
attributes.title: no❤️🦋✨🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.review: I opened the app to see a horrific site🙀it was what looked like cheeto in front of the american flag 🇺🇸 (not very cash money🤑❌) i cant believe the disrespect to the flag😔 after i put my info in it told me the app knew i was a minority and immediately un-installed itself😣😿 i would rate my experience a 1/69 🥴 𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣
attributes.title: Bayéës🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of learning more about one of our presidential candidates only to have the app open up to a being so hideous I can’t describe it. This orange monster of my nightmares proceeded to give me a heartache and my eyes began to burn from the sight of the horrid beast. I could almost hear it yell it’s racial slurs and see it fondling little girls. I do not recommend this garbage bin of an app.
attributes.title: APP ALMOST KILLED ME!!!

attributes.review: This app is very bad I do not understand how it is still even in the App Store. After downloading the app my cereal inside my box of cereal started jumping every 20 minutes, and when I tried to eat some the cereal jump yeeted itself in the fireplace and committed die. Also my bread kept talking to me saying “Oompa Loompa doo be da doo” and was singing some Billie eyelash songs. VERY BAD APP NEVER GET IT
attributes.title: This is horrible

attributes.review: This app is terrible because I went on it and apperently my pet fish jumped out of its tank so I had to give it “fish CPR” and it still wasn’t waking up and then I brought it to pet smart in a container and they said he died and then I found out that my dog ate my Mac and cheese I was gonna eat for breakfast and now I don’t have food for the rest of the month because of this app.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I’m blind. And I have my pet T. rex read everything for me. But there wasn’t a T. rex language option so I have no idea what this app said. In my opinion they are discriminating against t rex’s. Like I’m sorry they look scary but they are actually very soft creatures. Shame on u. And before you say how did you type this if ur blind? It’s called using the mic on ur phone sweetie.
attributes.title: Garbage
